item.title: Lab04_WriteUp
item.description: Question 1 dataset Question 1a Above, it seems like OFFENSE is more specific than CVLEGEND, e.g. “LARCENY” vs. “THEFT FELONY (OVER $950)”. If you’re unfamiliar with the term, “larceny” is a legal term for theft of personal property. To get a sense of how many subcategories there are for each OFFENSE, set calls_by_cvlegend_and_offense equal to a multi-indexed series where the data is first indexed on the CVLEGEND and then on the OFFENSE, and the data is equal to the number of offenses in the database that match the respective CVLEGEND and OFFENSE.
